question.title: No message available 404 Not Found Spring Boot
question.body:
I have a controller which has 2 services. One of them(getCustomer) works just fine when I call from Bruno. But the second one which is getEdwProcLog does not respond to Bruno calls. Here is the request and controller. Request : { "progId" : 164, "startTm" : "20240910" } Request URL : http://localhost:8080/edwapi/getEdwProcLog

Request Error:{ "timestamp": "2025-04-08T05:40:03.669+0000", "status": 404, "error": "Not Found", "message": "No message available", "path": "/edwapi/getEdwProcLog" }

Controller :

 @ChangesEdwStatInfo(state = ProcessingState.EXECUTING_REST_ENDPOINT)
    @ApiOperation(value = "getCustomer")
    @RequestMapping(value = "getCustomer", method = RequestMethod.POST)
    @EdwApiOperation
    public ResponseEntity<String> getCustomer(@RequestBody CustomerRequest request) throws Exception {
        CustomerResponse response = new CustomerResponse();
        try {
            response = getCustomerService.getCustomerService(request.getCustomerNumber());
        } catch (EdwException e) {
            logger.error("EdwException occured in getCustomer " + e, e);
            ApiUtility.prepareUIResponseForEdwException(response, e);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            logger.error("Error occured in getCustomer " + e, e);
            ApiUtility.prepareUIResponseForException(response, e);
        }
        return new ResponseEntity<String>(JsonUtil.toJson(response, true), HttpStatus.OK);
    }

    @ChangesEdwStatInfo(state = ProcessingState.EXECUTING_REST_ENDPOINT)
    @ApiOperation(value = "getEdwProcLog")
    @RequestMapping(value = "getEdwProcLog", method = RequestMethod.POST)
    @EdwApiOperation
    public ResponseEntity<List> getEdwProcLog(@RequestBody EdwProcLogRequest request) throws Exception {
        int i=0;
        logger.debug("getEdwProcLog request: " + JsonUtil.toJson(request, true));
        List<GetEdwProcLogInfoModel> response = Collections.singletonList(new GetEdwProcLogInfoModel());
        try {
            response = getEdwProcLogService.getEdwProcLogInfoService(request);
        } catch (EdwException e) {
            logger.error("EdwException occured in getEdwProcLog " + e, e);
            ApiUtility.prepareUIResponseForEdwException((BaseResponse) response, e);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            logger.error("Error occured in getEdwProcLog " + e, e);
            ApiUtility.prepareUIResponseForException((BaseResponse) response, e);
        }
        return new ResponseEntity<List>(Collections.singletonList(JsonUtil.toJson(response, true)), HttpStatus.OK);
    }
